name: Wager: The Betting Game for Gambling with Friends
name_original: Wager: The Betting Game for Gambling with Friends
description:
Time to make some money off of your friends!!

"Better than POKER!!" -T Steady

-Win REAL Money!
-Easy Gambling Party Game
-It's like LCR (Left Center Right)

Wager is an easy to play betting game that's great at parties and could even pocket you a few dollars! We combined elements of classic dice and card games to create a unique gambling experience.

Simply gather some friends, a few dollars, and play! Just place the game in the center, press the card, and do what it says! It will have you swapping dollars until a winner finally emerges to take the entire pot!
